title: Pittsburgh Pirates average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 29.96 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 19.99 was reached at Year 2015
